url('http://171.244.9.9:9301/content/fonts/OpenSans.ttf') format('truetype'); font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;}.wdg_content{width: 600px; height: 1180px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 40px 5px;}.wdg_iconTitle{float: left;}.wdg_titleContent{text-transform: uppercase; font-weight: bold; font-family: 'Open Sans bold'; font-weight: 600; font-size: 25px; text-align: center; color: #2f2e2e; margin-top: 0;}.wdg_titleContent h3{text-transform: uppercase; font-weight: bold; font-family: 'Open Sans bold'; font-size: 25px; color: #2f2e2e; margin-top: 0;}.wdg_titleContent h3 span{color: #666565; font-family: 'Open Sans normal'; font-size: 25px; font-weight: 400;}.wdg_titleContent p{border: 1px solid #810c15; margin-top: 21px; width: 28%;}.wdg_video{padding-top: 45px;}.wdg_video iframe{width: 100%; height: 315px;}.wdg_img_right img{width: 280px; height: 185px;}.wdg_img_three{float: left;}.wdg_three_textContent{position: relative; left: 20px;}.wdg_three_textContent a{font-size: 15px; color: #810c15; font-family: 'Open Sans bold'; font-weight: 600;}.wdg_img_three img{width: 235px; height: 155px;}.wdg_contenRight_one{padding-top: 30px; float: left; width: 290px;}.wdg_contenRight_two{padding-top: 30px; display: inline-block; width: 290px; padding-left: 20px;}.wdg_right_textContent a{font-size: 15px; color: #810c15; font-family: 'Open Sans bold'; font-weight: 600;}.wdg_right_textContent p{font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Open Sans normal'; font-weight: 300;}.wdg_title_video{font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans bold'; font-weight: 600;}^
